zombieimprovements.config.spawnSoundVolu: Might want to set this to something higher than 1 in 1.21.10 since it's quieter there for some reason.
zombieimprovements.config.noReinforcemen: Zombies from spawners can't call reinforcements
zombieimprovements.config.leaderMaxSpawn: This is the highest possible leader spawn chance which is reached at local difficulty 4.0. At local difficulty 2.0 and below the spawn chance is always 0.
